title: S8E13 – "Ethereal Encounters" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you four spine-chilling tales from author Kitty "The Odd Cat Lady" Olsen, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about peculiar patients, suspicious specters, killer confessions, and woodland wonders.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
